C

canJump(int, int, int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class Chat.CheckersData
This is called by the two previous methods to check whether the player can legally jump from (r1,c1) to (r3,c3).
canMove(int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class Chat.CheckersData
This is called by the getLegalMoves() method to determine whether the player can legally move from (r1,c1) to (r2,c2).
Chat - package Chat
 
ChatConnectionHandler - Class in Chat
ChatConnectionHandler is in charge of listening for connections from and initating connections to remote hosts.

ChatDisplay - Interface in Chat
Interface defining the callback methods that must be supported for the socket threads to send data back to.

chatMessage(SocketName, String) - Method in class Chat.Checkers.Board
This method receives messages sent from the other player and calls the appropriate methods.
ChatReceiver - Class in Chat
Thread class that deals with receiving data from a remote host and relaying it back to the main chat program.

Constructor.
ChatSender - Class in Chat
Thread class that deals with sending data from the program to a remote host.

Constructor.
Checkers - Class in Chat
This panel lets two users play checkers against each other.
Checkers() - Constructor for class Chat.Checkers
The constructor creates the Board (which in turn creates and manages the buttons and message label), adds all the components, and sets the bounds of the components.
Checkers.Board - Class in Chat
This panel displays a 160-by-160 checkerboard pattern with a 2-pixel black border.
checkersConstructorAndGetterMethods() - Method in class Chat.JUtestCheckers
